name: Only One Minute (TheCobe-Lee)
description:
I was busy during pretty much the whole jam so this garbage is all I could pump out.

You have one minute to obtain the golden chalice.  Explore and learn how to beat the level in the allotted time. 

Use the arrow keys to move. You probably want to fullscreen it. Refresh the page to restart the game.

This is technically the first game I've ever completed. As such it is absolutely TERRIBLE, but that's okay cause I tried something new. Don't judge me too hard.

Song is original. Sound effects via GameBurp's loyalty-free pack.
